Ingredients
1/4

brown mustard seeds

dry white wine
1/2

white wine vinegar
1/2

1
teaspoon

(optional)
Directions
Place mustard seeds, wine, and vinegar in a small bowl or container, cover, and let soak at room temperature for two days.
Serious Eats / Joshua Bousel
Transfer mustard seeds and liquid to jar of a blender. Add in salt and sugar, if using, and purée until mustard paste forms, but whole seeds still remain. Transfer to an airtight container and let rest in refrigerator for 2 days before use.
Serious Eats / Joshua Bousel
